name: Raccoon With A Gun: Trash Pandamonium
name_original: Raccoon With A Gun: Trash Pandamonium
description:
You're a raccoon with a gun. Survive the chaos and collect the garbage.

Made for GMTK  Jam 2020, missed the deadline. Submitted to GMTK 2020 Deadline Missers Jam instead. Made in 72 hours.

CREDITS:

Siltocyn - code and level design
Armadillo's Flying Circus - primary artist
Moola - music
Flowme - trashman sprite
Kabi-Ribi - miscellanious background decor
Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
